values: 承担；承载；支撑；忍受；容忍；经受；生育；产生；繁衍；开（花）；结（果）；带有；携带；拿着；表达；展示；呈现；维持；转向；向…行进；给予；导致；结果为；持有（股票等）；有（某个名称）；（价格、市场等）下跌；转向；举止；心怀

持票人；[建] 承木；[机] 托架；送信人；搬运工人

word_group.brief_definition: 与…有关；压在…身上；成为…负担
携带武器, 佩戴盾形徽号, 展示盾形纹章；当兵, 打仗

word_group.phrase: like a bear with a sore head

word_group.brief_definition: 粗鲁而紧紧的拥抱；熊抱

list.abstract: 熊（学名：Ursidae，英文名称：Bear），食肉目熊科动物，属国家一级保护哺乳动物。 熊躯体粗壮肥大，体毛又长又密，脸形像狗，头大嘴长，眼睛与耳朵都较小，臼齿大而发达，尾巴短小，嗅觉非常发达，受到挑衅或遇到危险时，容易暴怒，打斗起来非常凶猛，主要分布在北半球、南美洲北部等地。有冬季睡眠习性，冬季睡眠期由10月至翌年春天，食性杂，多以野菜及野果、植物幼嫩部分为食。最爱食蜂蜜，亦食鸟、小兽及昆虫。 熊是国家一级保护动物。现在许多地区和国家已经无熊，有些种群濒于灭绝的边缘。我国政府于1980年把马来熊列为一类、棕熊二类、黑熊三类保护动物，不准毫无节制地乱捕猎杀。
Bear：iPhone、iPad和Mac专有，是一款优雅灵活的书写工具，用于写笔记和散文。凭借简洁干净的设计、漂亮的排版，帮助作家专注于内容，并在任何时候和任何灵感发生时记录出色的结果。2017年6月，获得苹果设计大奖。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you really hear a bear? Go-go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你真的听到熊叫了吗？进去啦。

yingyinNormal.en: Not to worry. I'll ring doctor Brown Bear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别担心。我来给棕熊医生打电话。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you Doctor Brown Bear. Goodbye. Bye.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢你棕熊医生。再见。再见。

yingyinNormal.en: Who wants the Teddy bear with one leg? I do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谁要一条腿的泰迪熊？我要。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you for looking after us, Doctor Brown Bear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢你来照顾我们，棕熊医生。

yingyinNormal.en: So what, no bear? Oh, please! You'll have a bear in your life. Trust me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么情况，熊不卖了吗？小公主，你命中注定会有"熊"男的，相信我。

yingyinNormal.en: So, you don't give up on that Teddy bear. You hang on tight. You find that bear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，不要放弃那只泰迪熊，抓紧点，找到那只熊。

yingyinNormal.en: Tonight we'll hear the story of Krispy Bear. A long time ago, this little bear was alive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今晚我们讲脆脆熊的故事，很久很久以前 这只小熊还活着 。

yingyinNormal.en: That bear has been hanging on by a thread for years. Everybody knows this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个熊早就快散架了，大家都知道。

yingyinNormal.en: Today, people, we are gonna debut the brand-new Care Bear bikini!
yingyinNormal.zh: 都听好了，今天就是爱心熊比基尼的处女秀！

yingyinNormal.en: We're looking for Riley's lost Teddy. Barry the Bear Bear? She's had that thing forever. You lost it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们在找莱丽丢了的泰迪。小熊巴里吗？那熊她玩了挺长时间了吧？你搞丢了？

yingyinNormal.en: Can we fast forward this to me having the bear and you two leaving?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们能不能速战速决，把熊卖给我，你们俩快走人？

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. Are you with that bear? Because I think someone needs to talk to him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你和那只熊是一起的吗？我觉得有人得和他谈谈。

yingyinNormal.en: I turn into a bear? Seriously? Gamma rays? Bruce Banner? You didn't get The Incredible Hulk from that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 成熊了？不是吧？伽马射线？你？这都联想不到绿巨人？

yingyinNormal.en: Right. Not good. It's that one percent doctrine. Hey, watch out for that bear!
yingyinNormal.zh: 正是如此。情况不太妙，现在考虑一下百分之一原则，喂，注意点那只熊！

yingyinNormal.en: I'm a bear. It means that I have to eat my weight every day for hibernation purposes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是一头熊，我每天得吃掉跟自己的体重一样重的食物，好为冬眠做准备。

yingyinNormal.en: Finally, we have 14 missing mammal cases. All predators. From a giant polar bear to a teensy little otter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最后，有14起哺乳动物失踪案，全是食肉动物，从大北极熊到小水獭。

yingyinNormal.en: Talked to the fist, because the face is pissed. I'm getting attitude from a bear? That's where I'm at?
yingyinNormal.zh: 跟我的铁拳说去，我的脸在不爽着呢。我居然要受一只熊的气，我沦落到这般田地了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I'll give you 600 for the bear. Sold. No, Max! That's your childhood. 700. Sold! No, Max!
yingyinNormal.zh: 那只熊我出到600美元。成交 。不行，麦克斯！那可是你的童年。700美元 。成交！不行，麦克斯！

yingyinNormal.en: Are we done with this? Almost, Franken Berry, Boo Berry, Sugar Bear and the Honey Nut Cheerio bee, I believe his name is Buzz.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说完了吗？快了，红莓怪人，蓝莓鬼鬼，糖糖熊，蜜果圈圈蜂，他的名字是叫巴兹[嗡嗡声]吧。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 印有; 写有; 刻有; 绘有

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 站相；步态；关系；关联；宽容；容忍；轴承；支承；承座；支轴；方位；方向角；方位角；象限角；图案
n. 出生；诞生；产生；开始；出身；起源；血统；新生婴儿；贵族血统

word_family.mean: v. 携带；拿；支持；支撑；忍受；生育；拐弯；不能忍受；表现；经得起

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 与...有关；压在...身上；成为...负担

sense_info_list.en: take responsibility for

examination_example.sentence: The cost of investing in and running the rail network should be <highlight>borne</highlight> by those who use it, rather than the general taxpayer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 投资和运营铁路网的费用应由其使用者承担，而非全体纳税人。

examination_example.sentence: The report calls for the encouragement of scholars to bring their learning to <highlight>bear</highlight> on the great challenges of the day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该报告呼吁鼓励学者们将他们的学习成果用于应对当今的巨大挑战。

sense_info_list.en: endure something with tolerance, especially an ordeal or difficulty

examination_example.sentence: To the men and women who served in World War Ⅱ, the G.I. was the guy who <highlight>bore</highlight> all the burdens of battle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于在第二次世界大战中服役的男男女女来说，G.I.是一个承受了所有战争重担的人。

examination_example.sentence: The challenge the computer mounts to television thus <highlight>bears</highlight> little similarity to one format being replaced by another.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，计算机对电视的挑战与一种格式被另一种格式取代几乎没有相似之处。

examination_example.sentence: Neither of these patterns is <highlight>borne</highlight> out by the analysis, suggesting that the structures of the languages are lineage-specific.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这两种模式均未被分析所证实，这表明语言的结构是特定于谱系的。

sense_info_list.en: a large, heavy, cumbersome man
something that is very difficult or unpleasant to deal with
a rough, bad-mannered, or uncouth person
a person who forecasts that prices of stocks or commodities will fall, especially a person who sells shares hoping to buy them back later at a lower price
(of a vehicle or boat) convey passengers or cargo
turn and proceed in a specified direction
(of a person) carry
be able to accept or stand up to
be called by a name or title
hold or support something
carry or conduct oneself in a particular manner
have or display as a visible mark or feature
sense_info_list.zh: 印有; 写有; 刻有; 绘有

word_usage.usage:
bear作动词有“承担；负责；承载”之义，短语to bring sth. to bear on sth.的含义是“把精力用于……上；用……处理/应对”
真题例句：…increased funding for teachers and the encouragement of scholars to bring their learning to bear on the great challenges of the day.增加对教师的资助，鼓励学者们将他们的学识用于应对当今的巨大挑战。（2014考研英语一 阅读理解）
bear可以表示“显示；带有”，短语 sth.bear little resemblance/similarity. to sth.表示“某物与某物不太相似”

短语bear sb/sth. out指“证实；为……作证”
真题例句:Neither of these patterns is borne out by the analysis, suggesting that the structures of the languages are lineage-specific and not governed by universals.这两种模式都没有被分析所证实，表明这些语言的结构是特定血统的，而不是由普遍性所支配的。(2012考研英语一 翻译)

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 忍受，常可与stand换用，指对苦难、疼痛、不幸、损失的忍受，多用于否定句。
忍受，比bear, stand更正式，多用于否定句。
容忍，指对人或行为的容忍，不指对苦难的忍受。
忍受，常可与bear换用，指对苦难、疼痛、不幸、损失的忍受，多用于否定句。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 出生地；发源地；诞生地；发祥地
n. 再生；重生；新生；复兴；复活
n. 出生；诞生；产生；开始；出身；起源；血统；新生婴儿；贵族血统

word_family.mean: v. 携带；拿；支持；支撑；忍受；生育；拐弯；不能忍受；表现；经得起

examination_example.sentence: But these plans will not <highlight>bear</highlight> fruit unless they get considerably more support from policy-makers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，除非这些计划能得到政策制定者更多的支持，否则它们不会取得成果。

examination_example.sentence: A polar <highlight>bear</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一只北极熊。

examination_example.sentence: It's the fastest-ever recovery of a mammal, joining peers like the Louisiana black <highlight>bear</highlight> as glowing successes in the history of the Endangered Species Act.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是有史以来哺乳动物恢复正常最快的一次，与路易斯安那黑熊(Louisiana)等动物一样，成为《濒危物种法》(Endangered Species Act)历史上的成功典范。

examination_example.sentence: The RIKEN-TRI Collaboration Center for Human-Interactive Robot Research decided to develop a robotic nurse that looks like a huge teddy <highlight>bear</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: RIKEN-TRI 人机交互机器人研究合作中心决定开发一个看起来像巨大泰迪熊的机器人护士。

sense_info_list.en: take responsibility for

examination_example.sentence: Best Buy, for instance, has been <highlight>bearing</highlight> the lion's share of e-waste volume.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以百思买(Best Buy)为例，它在电子垃圾回收项目中一直扮演着“领头羊”的角色。

examination_example.sentence: If taxpayers are to <highlight>bear</highlight> the cost of forgiving student loans, shouldn't they have a say in how their money is used?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果纳税人要承担免除学生贷款的费用，难道他们不应该对自己的钱该怎么用有发言权吗？

sense_info_list.en: have or display as a visible mark or feature

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>bear</highlight> fewer social responsibilities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们承担的社会责任更少。

sense_info_list.en: endure something with tolerance, especially an ordeal or difficulty

examination_example.sentence: One luxury brand employee quit her job because she simply couldn't <highlight>bear</highlight> to see the destruction of unsold products.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个奢侈品牌的员工辞职了，因为她根本无法忍受看到未售出的产品被销毁。

examination_example.sentence: They could no longer <highlight>bear</highlight> the humidity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们再也不能忍受潮湿了。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) carry; (of a vehicle or boat) convey passengers or cargo
hold or support something

word_usage.usage: bear作动词，可表示“忍受，容忍”。在肯定句中，bear指某人虽受折磨，但以某种方式忍受其痛苦经历；而在否定句中，bear表示某人/某物过于令人烦恼，让人无法忍受。作此义解时，bear不能用于被动结构。

examination_example.sentence: Why do working women of child-<highlight>bearing</highlight> age tend to feel drained of energy?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么育龄职业女性容易感到精力枯竭？

examination_example.sentence: Please <highlight>bear</highlight> in mind that the price includes moving all the furniture, and the whole task would take two days.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请记住，该价格包括搬走所有家具，整个任务需要两天的时间。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 站相；步态；关系；关联；宽容；容忍；轴承；支承；承座；支轴；方位；方向角；方位角；象限角；图案
n. 出生地；发源地；诞生地；发祥地
n. 出生；诞生；产生；开始；出身；起源；血统；新生婴儿；贵族血统

word_family.mean: v. 携带；拿；支持；支撑；忍受；生育；拐弯；不能忍受；表现；经得起

examination_example.sentence: Making the best of this close encounter (相遇), I took some pictures of the <highlight>bear</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 充分利用这次近距离相遇，我拍了一些熊的照片。

examination_example.sentence: With an angry roar (吼叫), the <highlight>bear</highlight> ran to the lake to wash his eyes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 带着愤怒的吼叫，熊跑到湖边洗眼睛。

examination_example.sentence: This polar <highlight>bear</highlight> just kept trying to tear down the fence with his massive paws (爪子).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这只北极熊一直试图用它巨大的爪子推倒栅栏。

sense_info_list.zh: 生育; 结(果); 开(花)

examination_example.sentence: Three of the four Lincoln sons were <highlight>born</highlight> here.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 林肯的四个儿子中有三个出生在这里。

examination_example.sentence: His mother, grandmother and great grandmother were all <highlight>born</highlight> at the reserve and still live there.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的母亲、祖母和曾祖母都出生在保护区，现在仍然住在那里。

examination_example.sentence: They had their first <highlight>born</highlight> in January.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的第一个孩子出生于一月份。

examination_example.sentence: They've been too badly hurt and they can't <highlight>bear</highlight> to let it happen again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们受到了太严重的伤害，无法承受让这种事情再次发生。

examination_example.sentence: We learn to <highlight>bear</highlight> with the things we can't change.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们学会忍受我们无法改变的事情。

examination_example.sentence: On a summer evening in Beijing in 2008, all those long, hard hours of work and commitment finally <highlight>born</highlight> fruit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2008年北京的一个夏日夜晚，所有那些漫长而艰辛的工作和投入终于取得了成果。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 站相；步态；关系；关联；宽容；容忍；轴承；支承；承座；支轴；方位；方向角；方位角；象限角；图案
n. 出生地；发源地；诞生地；发祥地
n. 出生；诞生；产生；开始；出身；起源；血统；新生婴儿；贵族血统

word_family.mean: v. 携带；拿；支持；支撑；忍受；生育；拐弯；不能忍受；表现；经得起

examination_example.sentence: The number of polar <highlight>bears</highlight> is smaller and smaller.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 北极熊的数量越来越少。

examination_example.sentence: So far there are no wolves or <highlight>bears</highlight> in Britain's forests—but soon there might be!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到目前为止，英国的森林里没有狼或熊——但很快就会有了！

examination_example.sentence: Then Doctor Tim gave her a teddy <highlight>bear</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后蒂姆医生给了她一只泰迪熊。

sense_info_list.en: endure something with tolerance, especially an ordeal or difficulty

examination_example.sentence: The pain in my back was hard to <highlight>bear</highlight> and even basic daily tasks became difficult.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我背部的疼痛难以忍受，甚至连基本的日常任务都变得困难。

examination_example.sentence: She could not <highlight>bear</highlight> (忍受) the bad smell of his old feet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她受不了他那双老脚的臭味。

examination_example.sentence: Grandma loved me so much that I couldn't <highlight>bear</highlight> to keep anything from her.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 奶奶太爱我了，我不忍心对她隐瞒什么。

word_usage.usage: bear作动词，可表示“忍受，容忍”。在肯定句中，bear指某人虽受折磨，但以某种方式忍受其痛苦经历；而在否定句中，bear表示某人/某物过于令人烦恼，让人无法忍受。作此义解时，bear不能用于被动结构。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，指忍受饥饿、寒冷、疼痛、不幸、困难、侮辱等，多强调忍受者的勇敢和坚毅。
口语用词，常可与bear换用，但stand侧重指经受得起，bear强调容忍，是普通用语。
